title: 113 81 21 "Two Bad""Alubarna Grieves! The Fierce Captain Karoo!"Transliteration: "Naki no Arubāna! Gekitō Karū taichō" (Japanese:嘆きのアルバーナ!激闘カルー隊長!) Hidehiko Kadota Michiru Shimada June 2, 2002(2002-06-02)[62] March 3, 2007[63][64]
